dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2326 video clips divided into two groups, with annotations providing bounding boxes for people, position, and visibility for 13 body joints in each frame.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. Zuffi
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 316 video clips with complete bodies of people annotated with 15 body joints, where each joint is annotated as visible.
dcterms:title: Sub-JHMDB Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Andriluka
U. Iqbal
E. Insafutdinov
L. Pishchulin
A. Milan
J. Gall
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for multi-person human pose estimation, containing 593 training samples, 170 validation samples, and 375 testing samples with 15 joints.
dcterms:title: PoseTrack2018 Dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Lin
H. Liu
S. Liu

dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark for human-centric video analysis in complex events, containing 32 video sequences with annotations for human poses in each frame.
dcterms:title: HiEve Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Lin

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of over 57K training images and 150K training person instances, where each person instance has 17 joints.
dcterms:title: COCO2017 Dataset
